headline: How The Molson Coors Beverage (TAP) Narrative Is Shifting With Mixed Analyst Signals
summary: What Is Driving the Subtle Shift in the Molson Coors Narrative? The tiny reduction in fair value from $51.10 to $51.00, together with only fractional changes in inputs like the discount rate and long term revenue growth, reflects what you are really seeing here: an adjustment in the story around Molson Coors rather than a wholesale rethink of the business. Recent Street commentary mixes optimism on the company’s ability to hit revenue assumptions with caution around how much growth to bake...
